author.description: artist, curator, collector, writer; cfo/coo at ClubNFT & Right Click Save; mom  //   linktr.ee/danielle_king   //   https://danielle-king.com

text: I highly recommend folks check out the great book "The Story of Art Without Men" by Katy Hessel. A wonderful read with gorgeous images. Educate yourself on incredible women artists that many art history texts have left out of the story...
